}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== OEM Accton ("P/N: 142000000013A REV: 02", revision and part number may vary between units)
Green PCB. Supposed to have greater Rx sensitivity than the [[ALFA Network AWUS050NH v1]].
The internals appear very similar to the [[ALFA Network AWUS051NH]] (and early AWUS051NH models may be identical).
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> File:AWUS050NH V2 top.jpg|unit top File:AWUS050NH V2 bot.jpg|unit bottom </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:AWUS050NH V2 board top.jpg|board top File:AWUS050NH V2 board bot.jpg|board bottom File:ALFA_AWUS050NH_v2_top.jpg|top of the PCB, RF shield removed, scan File:ALFA_AWUS050NH_v2_bot.jpg|bottom of the PCB, scan </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
